import React from "react"; import "../../../App.css"; import "./About.css"; const About = () => { return (

About Us

Drmz System Innovations is a registered Pvt. Ltd. Company that provides embedded system and IoT solutions. We aim to provide unique, customized, and user-friendly solutions and products in the embedded systems space. At Drmz, we are a team of creative, enthusiastic, and focused people.

The company is working on cutting-edge technologies and related products like the Internet of Things (IoT), Industrial Robotics, Industrial Automation, Home and Office Automation, Demand-side Energy Management System, Smart Wireless Modules for IoT, Smart Attendance System, Smart Solar Power Generation Management System, etc.

We are a leading organization with several years of experience in our field. Our team has successfully completed numerous projects and has been recognized with prestigious awards.{" "} {/* Add more details about your organization */}

Years of Experience

With over 10 years of experience in the industry, we have successfully delivered high-quality solutions to our clients, gaining their trust and satisfaction.
